alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 28 at 1:52AM MST until July 28 at 5:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...All of northern Arizona. * WHEN...Through early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Flash flooding will be possible in creeks, normally dry washes, swimming holes and over recently burned areas. Low-water crossings could also experience flash flooding, which would create deadly travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rainfall has created saturated soils across the region. Additional showers and thunderstorms are likely, further increasing the flash flood threat. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains
